channel.description: Shell Scripts A group of Linux commands along with control structures and optional comments stored in a text file. Can be executed directly at the Linux command prompt. Do not need to be compiled as they are interpreted by the shell line by line. Managing packages and users, administering partitions and file systems, monitoring file system utilization, trimming log files, archiving and compressing files, finding and removing unnecessary files, starting and stopping database services and applications, and producing reports.
